document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0ff9e">'Houses' </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">so </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9490ff">Wise </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">men </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">tell </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9490ff">'Mansions'! </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9490ff">Mansions </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">must </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#bce454">warm! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9490ff">Mansions </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">cannot </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">let </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#88b0e0">tears </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9490ff">Mansions </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">must </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9490ff">exclude </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9490ff">storm! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">'Many </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9490ff">Mansions', </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">by </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">'his </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9490ff">Father' </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">dont </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">know </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">him; </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9084d4">snugly </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9490ff">built! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Could </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">children </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9490ff">find </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">way </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">there </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Some, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">would </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">even </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9084d4">trudge </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9490ff">tonight! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: 'Houses' - so the wise men tell me
